test_cases.title: Create Standard PO with All Mandatory Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that a Buyer can create a standard PO when all mandatory fields are provided.
preconditions: Purchasing org, group, company code, plant configured
test_steps: Enter Vendor, Material, Quantity, Price, Plant, Delivery Date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created successfully, unique PO number generated, status is 'Saved' or 'Awaiting release', no FI document posted.

test_cases.title: Block PO Creation When Vendor Is Missing
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation is blocked if Vendor is not entered.
test_steps: Enter Material, Quantity, Price, Plant, Delivery Date
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message 'Vendor is required', PO is not created, no PO number generated.

test_cases.title: Block PO Creation When Material Is Missing
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation is blocked if Material is not entered for any line item.
test_steps: Enter Vendor, Quantity, Price, Plant, Delivery Date
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message 'Material is required', PO is not created.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Boundary Values for Quantity and Price
test_cases.description: Verify PO creation with minimum and maximum allowed values for Quantity and Price.
test_steps: Enter Vendor, Material, Quantity=1, Price=0.01, Plant, Delivery Date
Repeat with Quantity=maximum allowed, Price=maximum allowed
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created for valid boundary values, system blocks PO for values outside allowed range.

test_cases.title: PO Approval via Release Strategy
test_cases.description: Verify that PO requires approval and only authorized users can release.
test_steps: Attempt to release PO as Buyer
test_cases.expected_results: PO status is 'Blocked for release' until Approver releases; Buyer cannot release; audit trail records release.

test_cases.title: No FI Document Posted at PO Creation
test_cases.description: Verify that no FI document is generated when PO is created.
test_steps: Check PO history for accounting documents
test_cases.expected_results: No FI document exists for PO creation; only purchasing document is present.

test_cases.title: Post Full Goods Receipt Against Released PO
test_cases.description: Verify that full GR can be posted for a released PO, and correct FI posting is generated.
test_steps: Post GR for full PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Material document and FI document created; FI posts debit to Inventory/Expense and credit to GR/IR.

test_cases.title: Post Partial Goods Receipt and Track Open Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that partial GR can be posted and open quantity is tracked.
test_steps: Check PO history for open quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Partial GR posted; received and open quantities updated in PO history; FI document for received quantity only.

test_cases.title: Prevent GR Posting for Unreleased PO
test_cases.description: Verify that GR cannot be posted for a PO that is not released.
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks GR posting; error message indicates PO approval required; no material or FI document created.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice with 3-Way Match Within Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice matching PO and GR within tolerance is posted successfully and FI document is generated.
test_steps: Reference PO, enter invoice details matching PO/GR
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted without block; FI document created; GR/IR cleared for invoiced quantity.

test_cases.title: Block Invoice for Payment When Price Difference Exceeds Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice is blocked for payment when price exceeds tolerance.
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment; payment block indicator and reason visible; invoice cannot be paid until resolved.

test_cases.title: Block Invoice for Payment When Quantity Difference Exceeds Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice is blocked for payment when quantity exceeds tolerance.
test_steps: Enter invoice quantity exceeding GR and tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment; payment block indicator and reason visible; invoice status reflects block.

test_cases.title: Automatic Clearing of GR/IR Account on Invoice Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR account is cleared automatically when invoice is posted.
test_steps: Display GR/IR line items for PO/material/vendor
Check GR/IR line items after invoice
test_cases.expected_results: GR/IR open item is offset by invoice; balance reduced or cleared; clearing reference visible.

test_cases.title: Real-Time FI Integration for Goods Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document is generated immediately when GR is posted.
test_steps: Open Display Accounting Document from GR/PO history
test_cases.expected_results: FI document is available instantly; posting date/time matches GR posting; document linkage exists.

test_cases.title: Real-Time FI Integration for Invoice Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify that vendor liability is posted in real time upon invoice posting.
test_cases.expected_results: FI document created; vendor open item visible; due date and payment terms derived as configured.

test_cases.title: Correct FI Account Determination for Inventory/Expense and GR/IR
test_cases.description: Verify that correct GL accounts are used for inventory/expense and GR/IR at GR time.
preconditions: PO created for material with known valuation class
test_cases.expected_results: Inventory/expense and GR/IR GL accounts match configuration and company standards.

test_cases.title: View PO History with Document Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that PO history lists all related GR and invoice documents with details.
preconditions: At least one GR and one invoice posted
test_cases.expected_results: Entries for GR and IR exist; document numbers, dates, quantities, amounts, and status are displayed.

test_cases.title: View GR Status for PO Items
test_cases.description: Verify that received and open quantities are displayed for each PO item.
test_cases.expected_results: Received quantity equals posted GR; open quantity remains; status updates in real time.

test_cases.title: View Invoice Status and Payment Block Indicator
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice status and payment block indicator are visible for blocked invoices.
preconditions: At least one blocked invoice exists
test_steps: Check payment block indicator and reason
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice status is 'Blocked'; payment block indicator and reason are displayed; block reason corresponds to discrepancy.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Balance Reporting for Period Close
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR balance report displays open and cleared items, and links to FI documents.
preconditions: POs with GR posted, some with invoice posted, some without
test_steps: Run GR/IR balance report for company code/period
test_cases.expected_results: Open GR/IR items for uninvoiced GRs are visible; fully matched POs do not appear as open; report links to FI documents.

test_cases.title: Buyer Cannot Post Supplier Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that Buyer role cannot post supplier invoices.
test_steps: Attempt to access Create Supplier Invoice app
test_cases.expected_results: Access denied or app not visible; Buyer cannot post invoices.

test_cases.title: AP User Cannot Release PO
test_cases.description: Verify that AP user cannot approve or release POs.
test_cases.expected_results: Authorization error or release button not available; AP user cannot release PO.

test_cases.title: UI Element Visibility: Release PO Button Only for Approver
test_cases.description: Verify that Release PO button is visible only to Approver role.
test_steps: Login as Buyer, open PO awaiting release
Login as Approver, open same PO
test_cases.expected_results: Release PO button not visible for Buyer; visible and actionable for Approver.

test_cases.title: UI Element Visibility: Post Goods Receipt Action Only for GR-Authorized Role
test_cases.description: Verify that Post Goods Receipt action is available only to GR-authorized users.
test_steps: Login as non-authorized user, search for GR posting app
Login as GR clerk, open GR posting app
test_cases.expected_results: GR posting app/action not visible or access denied for non-authorized user; visible for GR clerk.

test_cases.title: UI Element Visibility: Payment Block Indicator on Blocked Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that Payment Block indicator is visible on blocked invoices.
test_cases.expected_results: Payment Block indicator is visible and populated with reason.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close Beyond Tolerances
test_cases.description: Verify that fully matched POs result in zero open GR/IR balance at period close.
preconditions: At least one PO processed end-to-end with full GR and matching invoice
test_steps: Run GR/IR open item report for the period
Check open balances for matched POs
test_cases.expected_results: No open GR/IR for fully matched POs; residuals only within tolerances; flagged if beyond tolerance.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Past Delivery Date
test_cases.description: Verify that PO cannot be created with a delivery date in the past.
test_steps: Enter all mandatory fields with delivery date in the past
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error or warning; PO creation is blocked if delivery date is not valid.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Invalid Plant
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation is blocked if Plant is invalid or not configured.
test_steps: Enter all mandatory fields with invalid Plant code
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message; PO is not created.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Duplicate PO Number
test_cases.description: Verify that system does not allow duplicate PO numbers.
test_steps: Create PO and note PO number
Attempt to manually create another PO with same number (if system allows manual entry)
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents duplicate PO number; error displayed.

test_cases.title: PO Approval Audit Trail Verification
test_cases.description: Verify that audit trail records who approved PO and when.
test_cases.expected_results: Audit trail displays user and timestamp for PO approval.

test_cases.title: GR Posting for Non-Stock Material
test_cases.description: Verify that GR can be posted for a PO item with expense account assignment.
test_cases.expected_results: FI document debits expense account and credits GR/IR account.

test_cases.title: Partial Invoice Posting for Partial GR
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice can be posted for partial GR and GR/IR is partially cleared.
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted for partial quantity; GR/IR partially cleared.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Payment Terms Boundary Values
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice posting derives payment terms correctly, including boundary values.
test_steps: Post invoice with earliest and latest allowed due dates
Check vendor open item for due date
test_cases.expected_results: Due date and payment terms are derived as configured for boundary values.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Invalid Vendor
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice posting is blocked if vendor is invalid or inactive.
test_steps: Attempt to post invoice referencing PO with inactive vendor
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks invoice posting; error message displayed.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Clearing for Multiple Invoices
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR is cleared correctly when multiple invoices are posted for partial GRs.
test_steps: Post invoice for first partial GR
Post invoice for second partial GR
Check GR/IR balance after each invoice
test_cases.expected_results: GR/IR is cleared incrementally for each invoice; final balance is zero after all quantities invoiced.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Price at Tolerance Boundary
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with price exactly at tolerance limit is posted without block.
test_steps: Post invoice with price at tolerance limit
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted without block; system does not block or park invoice.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Quantity at Tolerance Boundary
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with quantity exactly at tolerance limit is posted without block.
test_steps: Post invoice with quantity at tolerance limit
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted without block; system does not block or park invoice.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access: GR Clerk Cannot Create PO
test_cases.description: Verify that GR clerk cannot access PO creation functionality.
test_steps: Attempt to access Create Purchase Order app
test_cases.expected_results: Access denied or app not visible; GR clerk cannot create PO.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties: Buyer Cannot Post Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that Buyer cannot post supplier invoices.
test_cases.expected_results: Access denied; audit log captures attempt.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties: AP User Cannot Create PO
test_cases.description: Verify that AP user cannot create purchase orders.
test_steps: Attempt to access Create Purchase Order app
test_cases.expected_results: Access denied; audit log captures attempt.

test_cases.title: Audit Log for Unauthorized Action Attempt
test_cases.description: Verify that audit logs capture attempts to perform unauthorized actions.
test_cases.expected_results: Audit log records user, action, timestamp, and denial reason.

test_cases.title: UI Adapts Dynamically to User Role
test_cases.description: Verify that UI elements change based on logged-in user role.
test_steps: Login as Buyer, check UI elements
Login as Approver, check UI elements
Login as AP clerk, check UI elements
test_cases.expected_results: UI displays only relevant actions for each role; unauthorized elements hidden or disabled.

test_cases.title: PO History Drill Down for Audit Purposes
test_cases.description: Verify that PO history allows drill down to GR and invoice document details for audit.
preconditions: PO created with GR and invoice posted
test_steps: Drill down into GR and invoice lines
test_cases.expected_results: Document details (numbers, dates, amounts) are accessible for audit.

test_cases.title: Reporting: GR/IR Balance Reconciliation
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR balance report reconciles with posting values.
preconditions: GR and invoice posted for multiple POs
test_steps: Compare report balances with FI postings
test_cases.expected_results: Report balances match FI posting values; discrepancies flagged.

test_cases.title: Reporting: Filter for Blocked Invoices
test_cases.description: Verify that users can filter or search for blocked invoices in reporting.
test_cases.expected_results: Only blocked invoices are displayed; payment block reason visible.

test_cases.title: Reporting: View Cleared GR/IR Items
test_cases.description: Verify that cleared GR/IR items are not shown as open in reporting.
test_cases.expected_results: Cleared items do not appear as open; only residuals within tolerance are shown.

test_cases.title: Boundary Test: Maximum Number of PO Items
test_cases.description: Verify that system allows creation of PO with maximum allowed number of items.
test_steps: Create PO with maximum allowed items
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created successfully if within system limits; error displayed if limit exceeded.

test_cases.title: Edge Case: GR Posting for PO with Zero Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that GR cannot be posted for PO item with zero quantity.
preconditions: PO released with item quantity zero
test_steps: Attempt to post GR for PO item with zero quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks GR posting; error message displayed.

test_cases.title: Edge Case: Invoice Posting for PO with No GR
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice cannot be posted for PO item with no GR posted.
test_steps: Attempt to post invoice referencing PO
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks invoice posting; error or warning displayed.

test_cases.title: Edge Case: Invoice Posting for Over-Received Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice cannot be posted for quantity greater than PO quantity.
test_steps: Attempt to post invoice for quantity greater than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks invoice posting; error or warning displayed.

summary: 50 comprehensive test cases were generated covering positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for all SAP S/4HANA P2P user stories and requirements, including PO creation and approval, GR and IR processing, FI integration, reporting, controls, role-based access, segregation of duties, UI visibility, and period-end requirements.
